statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%');
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_details WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders);
DELETE FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id = 1 AND product_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND name = 'John Doe';
